name: Attached Collision Mesh
description: Add or remove an attached collision mesh to the robot.

inputParameters.name: identifier
inputParameters.description: The identifier of the collision mesh.

inputParameters.name: link_name
inputParameters.description: The robot's link name to attach the mesh to.

inputParameters.name: touch_links
inputParameters.description: Names of links that the robot is allowed to touch.

inputParameters.name: add
inputParameters.description: If True, adds the collision mesh to the planning scene.

inputParameters.name: remove
inputParameters.description: If True, removes the collision mesh from the planning scene.

outputParameters.name: attached_collision_mesh
outputParameters.description: A collision mesh that is attached to a robot's link.
